signals.problem_statement: The customer lacks automation tools to manage support emails effectively, leading to manual forwarding and tracking issues.
signals.customer_ask: I would need to automate that because now I'm responsible for the support in terms that I'll forward the message to someone in our team.
signals.context: 14 team members managing support emails through a shared Google group.
signals.suggested_solution: It would be good if I could create templates and just send them.

signals.problem_statement: The customer finds it challenging to track the status of support cases due to the lack of visibility in email assignments.
signals.customer_ask: I need some kind of automation to help with the workflow, and to help like see where the case is going.
signals.context: 14 team members managing support emails through a shared Google group.
signals.suggested_solution: We want the messages to come into the support file so that everyone sees them and stays visible.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is overwhelmed by the volume of repetitive responses required for support inquiries.
signals.customer_ask: It would be good if I could create templates and just send them.
signals.context: 14 team members managing support emails through a shared Google group.
signals.suggested_solution: I can always search and I can start the emails and I can tag them as to do list but... it's starting to I'm at a point that there's so many cases.
